import React from'react';import{Doughnut}from'react-chartjs-2';import Chart from'chart.js/auto';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var DoughnutChart=function DoughnutChart(_ref){var serverData=_ref.serverData;var uniqueSectors=[];//using forEach because it doesn't return any array
serverData.forEach(function(i){if(!uniqueSectors.includes(i.sector)&&i.sector!==""){uniqueSectors.push(i.sector);}});var uniqueTopics=[];serverData.forEach(function(i){if(!uniqueTopics.includes(i.topic)&&i.topic!==""){uniqueTopics.push(i.topic);}});var uniqueRegion=[];serverData.forEach(function(i){if(!uniqueRegion.includes(i.region)&&i.region!==""){uniqueRegion.push(i.region);}});var uniqueCountry=[];serverData.forEach(function(i){if(!uniqueCountry.includes(i.country)&&i.country!==""){uniqueCountry.push(i.country);}});var uniqueSource=[];serverData.forEach(function(i){if(!uniqueSource.includes(i.source)&&i.source!==""){uniqueSource.push(i.source);}});var uniquePestle=[];serverData.forEach(function(i){if(!uniquePestle.includes(i.pestle)&&i.pestle!==""){uniquePestle.push(i.pestle);}});var label=["Country","Region","Source","Topic","Sector","Pestle"];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{height:'50vh',width:'45vw'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Doughnut,{data:{labels:label,datasets:[{label:"Total: ",data:[uniqueCountry.length,uniqueRegion.length,uniqueSource.length,uniqueTopics.length,uniqueSectors.length,uniquePestle.length],borderWidth:1,hoverOffset:5}]},options:{maintainAspectRatio:false,scales:{y:{type:'linear',beginAtZero:true}}},height:300})});};export default DoughnutChart;
